entry.title: orc13a/AmbuStatus: AmbuStatus is a lightweight monitoring system designed for ambulance stations. It detects whether ambulances are parked in their designated bays inside the garage and displays their status live on a screen in the crew common area.
entry.content: AmbuStatus is a lightweight monitoring system designed for ambulance stations. It detects whether ambulances are parked in their designated bays inside the garage and displays their status live on a screen in the crew common area.

entry.title: BearToCode/carta: A lightweight, fast and extensible Svelte Markdown editor and viewer.
entry.content: A lightweight, fast and extensible Svelte Markdown editor and viewer.

entry.title: ori88c/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
entry.content: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.

entry.title: miksrv/simple-react-ui-kit: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.
entry.content: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.

entry.title: Sandruttee/inventory-app: A lightweight web inventory app that lets you scan or enter barcodes, snap product photos via your device camera (converted to data-URLs), and store & retrieve items in Airtable.

entry.title: ShaAnder/Ping_Me_Frontend: Part 1 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the front end component to the application utilizing react and typescript to build a scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

entry.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.
